alert.note: Alert for Runnels (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 3:49PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Runnels County through 430 PM CDT... At 348 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wilmeth, or near Wingate. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Winters, Maverick, Hatchel, Crews, Norton, Benoit, Wingate, Drasco, Pumphrey, Wilmeth and Lake Winters Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
